content: oct 2020/pattern version 1 0 elliot 2x2 rib beanie pointers for 57cm 22 5 head circumference fitted approximately 35 g/245m 268 yds of light fingering weight yarn 100% wool 50g/350m/383 yds us 1/2 25mm dpns or 100cm circular needle for magic loop method if you prefer for working in the round 45 sts / 50 row = 10cm 4 in 2x2 rib stitch using us 1/2 25mm needles before blocking stitch marker tapestry needle beginner inside the designer s mind elliot 2x2 rib beanie is a classic yet versatile beanie that will go perfectly with your winter wardrobe it s easy to style and looks great for a casual look it is knitted with a light fingering weight yarn and in small gauge in order to achieve a more sophisticated look it is perfect for gift knitting as it suits all genders and ages cast on ※ if you wish to make different sizes please co multiple of 8 sts with us 1/2 25mm needle co 160 sts using 2x2 tubular cast-on or any other cast-on methods as you prefer place marker and join work into the round being careful not to twist your ring of stitches body round 1 *k 2 p 2* repeat between * until you reach end of round 2x2 rib repeat round 1 until you reach 20cm or your desired length crown decrease please follow the crown decreasing chart abbreviation co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 together ssk slip slip knit p purl st s stitch es thank you for purchasing this pattern if you have any questions please do not hesitate to contact me happy knitting email ignaciohsu@hotmail com ravelry rastushsu ig rastus0226
